entry.title: Book Recommendations
entry.content:
Streaming Systems

Data Engineering

  • Data Pipelines Pocket Reference by James Densmore

  • Data Analysis with Python and PySpark by Jonathan Rioux

Programming Language

    Find the books here

Other

  • The Manager’s Path by Camille Fournier
    Find the book here

entry.title: Apache Kafka Dead Letter Queues
entry.content:
If the message failed, would you miss it?
Are you going to do anything with it?

If not, then fine, you don’t need the DLQ, just get rid of it.

  • Just handle the exception and move on.
  • Put it somewhere where it can be found and drop the message.

Listen to this conversation here with Tim Burgland and Jason Bell.
